protein.specific_function: The lactotransferrin transferrin-like domain 1 functions as a serine protease of the peptidase S60 family that cuts arginine rich regions. This function contributes to the antimicrobial activity

go_class.description: cellular di-, tri-valent inorganic cation homeostasis
